title: UN Report Exposes $2.2 Billion Oil Corruption Scheme in South Sudan
summary: United Nations investigators on Tuesday unveiled rampant and systemic corruption by South Sudan’s ruling class, compounding the country’s security challenges and putting the pivotal oil-driven economy at severe risk. The global agency has accused South Sudanese authorities of plundering the country…
